name: Sacrifice
effect:
:instant: Redirect the :damage: dealt to the selected \* [unit](../units/index.md) to any other of your [units](../units/index.md).

:empower: 0 ➣ \*:bronze:
:empower: 2 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver:
:empower: 4 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver: or :golden:

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
